post_content:
1909 T206 1909 T206 Willis portrait GAI Good-VG 2.5-corner wear with some corner rounding on both bottom corners and staining bottom left corner. Also, crease top right corner and little diagonal crease in the colored background up and to the right of his head. Finally, a little white break in the paper service on the right of the card in the background to its border edge parallel to Willis's mid-head. $150.00.

S/h is $5.35.

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
